com.schneide.quantity.unit
Class AtomarUnit

java.lang.Object
  com.schneide.quantity.unit.AtomarUnit
Direct Known Subclasses:
AtomarAmpere, AtomarCandela, AtomarDegreeCelsius, AtomarDegreeFahrenheit, AtomarDimensionlessUnit, AtomarGram, AtomarHour, AtomarKelvin, AtomarMeter, AtomarMinute, AtomarMole, AtomarSecond, AtomarSievert
public abstract class AtomarUnit
extends java.lang.Object

The AtomarUnit is the part of the Unit, which knows all facts about the unit like name of the unit and its AtomarSignature
To get to know more about the use of units see Unit.

Author:
Matthias Kempka, Anja Hauth

Method Detail

getUnitName

public abstract java.lang.String getUnitName()
This method returns the full name of the referenced compoundUnit.
For example if the compoundUnit represents a meter, the return value of this method is "meter".

Returns:
String
See Also:
getUnitAbbreviation()

getUnitAbbreviation

public abstract java.lang.String getUnitAbbreviation()
This method returns the abbreviation of the referenced compoundUnit.
For example, if the compoundUnit represents a meter, the return value of this method is "m".

Returns:
String

getConversionFactorToReferenceUnit

public abstract ConversionFactor getConversionFactorToReferenceUnit()
Returns the conversion factor the value of this AtomarUnit needs to be multiplied with to get the value for the appropriate reference compoundUnit. For example, if the reference compoundUnit is a second, and this AtomarUnit is an hour, the return value is 0.277777777778*10^(-3).

Returns:
ConversionFactor
See Also:
ConversionFactor

getAtomarSignature

public AtomarSignature getAtomarSignature()
Returns the signatures.

Returns:
AtomarSignature
